titleNullable: Amazon Product Dataset: Sales & Customer Feedback
descriptionNullable:
This dataset combines Amazon product information with customer feedback and synthetic sales data.

**Product Data:**This data includes details scraped from Amazon product pages using Beautiful Soup and Selenium libraries. It may include attributes like product name, discount, old price, new price, etc. 


**Customer Feedback:** This data consists of customer reviews scraped from Amazon. It includes text reviews, ratings, etc. 


**Synthetic Sales Data:** This data is artificially generated to represent sales figures for the products. The generation process should be documented with details about the methodology used.
title: Amazon Product Dataset: Sales & Customer Feedback
subtitle: Product Details, Reviews, & Simulated Sales
description:
This dataset combines Amazon product information with customer feedback and synthetic sales data.

**Product Data:**This data includes details scraped from Amazon product pages using Beautiful Soup and Selenium libraries. It may include attributes like product name, discount, old price, new price, etc. 


**Customer Feedback:** This data consists of customer reviews scraped from Amazon. It includes text reviews, ratings, etc. 


**Synthetic Sales Data:** This data is artificially generated to represent sales figures for the products. The generation process should be documented with details about the methodology used.
